Subject: Help with clearing old host from database
Description: During our health call we discovered multiple host that we no longer have and would like to purge all records/data relating to them from our database.
What_We_Know__c:
Created a list of hosts with the status of offline (Offline Hosts)

Created a custom job (DropFSHost) in the zClone_Sandbox folder that will drop the data for the offline servers from the file system database tables

Scheduled the job --kick this off when there are no File System jobs running
Solution_Comment__c: Provided steps to create a job to clean up the FSAA tables by removing the data of decommissioned servers.
